    level="1"

    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Perfected Robes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2364)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 179 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These unadorned white robes, fastened with simple brass pins in the shape of a human hand, can't be soiled or blemished. While wearing _perfected robes_, you don't need to eat, sleep, or drink, but you can if you choose to. The robes bless you with constant [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) (+32 counteract bonus). A creature who dons these robes without earning them is [clumsy 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [enfeebled 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), and [stupefied 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) while wearing them, gaining the _true seeing_ but otherwise unable to use the robes' magic.

<document level="2" id="action-1931" />

<document level="2" id="action-1932" />

**Destruction** If the wearer ever willingly turns from the path of self-perfection into corruption or overindulgence, their _perfected robes_ crumble to nothing.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
